mapper.select: select g.idx as idx , g.subject as subject, g.content as content, g.regdate as regdate, m.username as username, m.photo as photo , (select count(*) from project.reply r where g.idx=r.guestbookidx) as replyCnt from guestbook g join member m on g.memberidx=m.idx order by idx desc limit #{param1}, #{param2}

select g.idx as idx, g.subject as subject, g.content as content, m.username as username, g.regdate as regdate, m.photo as photo, m.idx as memberidx, m.userid as userid from project.guestbook g join project.member m on g.memberidx=m.idx where g.idx=#{idx}
select r.idx, r.content, r.regdate, r.memberidx, r.guestbookidx, m.username, m.photo from member m join reply r on m.idx=r.memberidx where r.guestbookidx=#{idx}
